description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with pieces of sandwich cookies.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
Lavender flower water, wildflower honey. This flavor will make you feel like you’re drifting through a field in Provence… or maybe that’s just us.
We start with whole local strawberries and prep them by hand for this classic flavor.
Lemon + blueberry ice cream with cookie pieces
Vanilla wafer pieces in a banana ice cream base.
Sorbet flavors vary frequently, so call the shop to see what we’ve got in the case today! We promise it’s always vegan and always delicious.
Creamy coconut milk base with almond flavoring and dark chocolate “magic shell” mixed in.
Fresh orange juice and vanilla bean paste in a creamy mild coconut base.
